00038   // Attribute value tag type
00039   struct severity_tag;

00041   // The operator is used when putting the severity level to log
00042   boost::log::formatting_ostream& operator<<(boost::log::formatting_ostream& strm,
00043                                              boost::log::to_log_manip< severity_level, severity_tag > const& manip) {
00044     static const char* strings[] = { "I", "S", "W", "E"};  
00045     severity_level level(manip.get());
00046     if (static_cast< std::size_t >(level) < sizeof(strings) / sizeof(*strings))
00047       strm << strings[level];
00048     else
00049       strm << static_cast< int >(level);
00050 
00051     return strm;
00052   }

00059   void init(std::string path, std::string name) {
00060     boost::shared_ptr< boost::log::sinks::text_file_backend > backend
00061     (boost::make_shared< boost::log::sinks::text_file_backend >
00062      (boost::log::keywords::file_name = str(boost::format("%s/%s_y%%Y-m%%m-d%%d.%%02N.log") % path % name),
00063       boost::log::keywords::rotation_size = 10 * 1024 * 1024,
00064       boost::log::keywords::time_based_rotation = boost::log::sinks::file::rotation_at_time_point(0, 0, 0),
00065       boost::log::keywords::auto_flush = true));
00066 
00067     typedef boost::log::sinks::synchronous_sink< boost::log::sinks::text_file_backend > sink_t;
00068     boost::shared_ptr< sink_t > sink(new sink_t(backend));
00069 
00070     boost::log::core::get()->add_sink(sink);
00071 
00072     sink->set_formatter
00073       (boost::log::expressions::stream
00074        << boost::log::expressions::attr<severity_level, severity_tag>("Severity") << "-"
00075        << boost::log::expressions::format_date_time<boost::posix_time::ptime>("TimeTag", "[%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%f]: ")
00076        << boost::log::expressions::smessage
00077        );
00078   }
